titles.title: Stimulus Repeal Act
To repeal the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and rescind all unobligated funds made available in such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 2/9/2011--Introduced. Stimulus Repeal Act - Repeals the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (ARRA). Restores provisions amended or repealed by such Act and rescinds all unobligated balances of the budgetary authority made available in such Act.
